Welcome to Krishi-Mitra

Your one-stop solution for modern and efficient farm management

About Krishi-Mitra

Krishi-Mitra is an innovative platform dedicated to empowering farmers by providing essential tools and resources to optimize agricultural activities. From finding the right manpower to renting farm equipment and predicting crop yields, we cover every aspect of farm management.

Worker Hiring Module

Connect with local laborers, filter by village, and hire workers for various agricultural tasks.

Crop Prediction Module

Leverage advanced machine learning to forecast crop yields based on soil type, weather, and historical data.

Weather Forecasting Module

Stay ahead with real-time weather updates to plan your farming activities efficiently.

Farm Equipment Rental

Find and rent farm equipment from local providers, saving costs without the burden of ownership.

Krishi-Mitra: Empowering Farmers, One Step at a Time.

); }; export default Home;
